title: ‘The Marvels’ Post-Credits Scene Sets Up Major MCU Reboot
description:
The Marvels has finally been released. The follow-up to both Captain Marvel and the Disney Plus series Ms. Marvel sets up a major reboot within the MCU during its post-credits scene, meaning that The Marvels could be even more important than previously speculated. Marvel Studios has been gradually taking advantage of Disney’s Fox acquisitions. This [...]

The post ‘The Marvels’ Post-Credits Scene Sets Up Major MCU Reboot appeared first on ScreenGeek.
